| **Data_spec 变量** | **Definition**                                                            | **对应数据集变量（示例）及说明**                                                                                       | **Source**                                                                                                                                                                             | **实际列名**                                  |
|--------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| UID / ID           | UID: unique subject identifier; ID: subject identifier for the study      | 多数数据集均有受试者标识，通常为 RSUBJ_ID (label: "Random Value for SUBJECT IDENTIFIER")                               | adex, base, brst, demo, dose, cpro, elig, eosr, eqlq, fact, lesn, loc_labs, mehx, muga, ntle, phex, phon, prth, pspn, ptss, resp, rlps, scan, surv, targ, toxy, vitl, wclesion, wcresp | RSUBJ_ID                                      |
| AGE                | Baseline age                                                              | 在 demo 数据集中为 AGE (label: "Age at Eligibility Verification")；wcresp 中也记录了 AGE                               | demo, wcresp                                                                                                                                                                           | AGE (demo, wcresp)                            |
| SEX                | Baseline 0 = Male, 1 = Female                                             | 数据中未见单独“SEX”变量；可能需从 demo 中 Child-bearing potential 等推断                                               | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| RACE               | Baseline 1 = White, 2 = BLACK, 3 = ASIAN / PACIFIC ISLANDER, …            | 多个数据集中均有 RACE_GEN (label: "Race")                                                                              | adex, base, brst, demo, dose, elig, eosr, eqlq, fact, lesn, loc_labs, mehx, muga, ntle, phex, phon, prth, pspn, ptss, resp, rlps, scan, surv, targ, toxy, vitl, wclesion, wcresp       | RACE_GEN                                      |
| ETHNIC             | Baseline ethnicity, 0 = Not hispanic or latino, 1 = hispanic or latino    | 数据集中未发现对应字段                                                                                                 | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| ARM                | Baseline treatment group, 0 = Placebo (all placebo)                       | 可使用 TMT (wcresp, wclesion 中，label: "Treatment Group") 或部分数据集的 ELIG_007 ("Randomized treatment assignment") | wcresp, wclesion, adex                                                                                                                                                                 | TMT, ELIG_007                                 |
| MENOS              | Baseline Menopausal status, 0 = postmenopausal, 1 = premenopausal         | 数据集中未见 "MENOS" 变量                                                                                              | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| LESIONS            | Baseline Number of lesion, 0=1 lesion, 2=2–3 lesion, 4=\>3 lesion         | base: BASE_001 ("Number of target lesions")；resp: RESP_001；wclesion: LESNUM；wcresp: NUMTGT                          | base, resp, wclesion, wcresp                                                                                                                                                           | BASE_001, RESP_001, LESNUM, NUMTGT            |
| ECOG               | Baseline ECOG status, 0=0, 1=1, 2=2–3                                     | pspn 数据集中为 PSPN_001 (label: "Current ECOG score")                                                                 | pspn                                                                                                                                                                                   | PSPN_001                                      |
| MORGAN             | Baseline Dominant metastatic organ site (1=Liver,2=Lung, …)               | 数据集中未见专门对应此概念 (转移部位信息散见于部分表，但无"dominant"字段)                                              | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| LINE               | Baseline Prior metastatic chemotherapy regimens (0=1st line,1=1,2=2,3=≥3) | prth 数据集中有 PRTH_000 (label: "Line of therapy")                                                                    | prth                                                                                                                                                                                   | PRTH_000                                      |
| CHEMO              | Baseline Prior chemotherapy, 0=No, 1=Yes                                  | 未见单一字段可直接表示既往化疗，可能需结合治疗史推断                                                                   | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| ANTHRAC            | Baseline Prior anthracycline therapy, 0=No, 1=Yes, 2=Metastatic only      | 数据集中未见此项                                                                                                       | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| WBC                | Baseline Leukocytes, missing=-999                                         | 在实验室数据集中 (cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs) 需根据 LABTEST 匹配 "Leukocytes"                             | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Leukocytes"                      |
| NEUT               | Baseline Neutrophils, missing=-999                                        | 同上，匹配 "Neutrophils"                                                                                               | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Neutrophils"                     |
| CREAT              | Baseline Creatinine, missing=-999                                         | 同上，匹配 "Creatinine"                                                                                                | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Creatinine"                      |
| ALT                | Baseline Alanine Aminotransferase, missing=-999                           | 同上，匹配 "ALT" 或 "Alanine Aminotransferase"                                                                         | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "ALT"                             |
| BILI               | Baseline Bilirubin, missing=-999                                          | 同上，匹配 "Bilirubin"                                                                                                 | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Bilirubin"                       |
| ALP                | Baseline Alkaline Phosphatase, missing=-999                               | 同上，匹配 "Alkaline Phosphatase"                                                                                      | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Alkaline Phosphatase"            |
| AST                | Baseline Aspartate Aminotransferase, missing=-999                         | 同上，匹配 "AST"                                                                                                       | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "AST"                             |
| ALB                | Baseline Albumin                                                          | 同上，匹配 "Albumin"                                                                                                   | cen_lab2, cen_lab3, cen_labs, loc_labs                                                                                                                                                 | LABTEST =\> "Albumin"                         |
| MHDEPRESSION       | Baseline previous history: depression, 0=No,1=Yes                         | 未见直接“抑郁史”字段；可能在 mehx 或 ptss 中查找"Depression" 文本，但无0/1编码                                         | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| MDANXIETY          | Baseline previous history: anxiety, 0=No,1=Yes                            | 同上，未见焦虑史字段                                                                                                   | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| HEIGHT             | Baseline Height, missing=-999                                             | demo 数据集中 DEMO_004 (label: "Height (cm)")                                                                          | demo                                                                                                                                                                                   | DEMO_004                                      |
| WEIGHT             | Baseline body weight, missing=-999                                        | phex 数据集中 PHEX_002 (label: "Weight (kg)")                                                                          | phex                                                                                                                                                                                   | PHEX_002                                      |
| DTHDY              | Death day, missing=-999                                                   | 未见直接记录“死亡日期”                                                                                                 | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| DTH                | Survival status, 1=Death,0=Censored,-999=missing                          | 在 surv 中可结合 SURV_001, SURV_003, SURV_005 等信息推断 (无单一列名 "DTH")                                            | surv                                                                                                                                                                                   | 无单一列 =\> 需推断                           |
| PFSDY              | Progression free survival (days), missing=-999                            | 未见直接字段；通常需结合进展时间与基线时间计算                                                                         | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| PFS                | Disease progression status, missing=-999                                  | surv: SURV_003 (Progression status) 可近似对应                                                                         | surv                                                                                                                                                                                   | SURV_003 (label: "Progression status")        |
| QSFLAG             | FLAG for each measurement                                                 | 未见对应问卷标识字段                                                                                                   | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| FLAG               | Numeric FLAG for measurement,1–30 for Q1–30,31=total score                | 问卷各题分开记录 (eqlq: EQLQ_001–EQLQ_030)，无统一 FLAG                                                                | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
| DV                 | Numeric measurement result                                                | echo, muga, dose 等各自记录 (如 ECHO_004, MUGA_004, DOSE_011...)                                                       | echo, muga, dose                                                                                                                                                                       | ECHO_004, MUGA_004, DOSE_011 (视具体测量而定) |
| TIME               | Time of the question measured                                             | dose: DOSE_002/DOSE_004 (Start/Stop time), vitl: VITL_001 (Time of vitals)                                             | dose, vitl                                                                                                                                                                             | DOSE_002, DOSE_004, VITL_001                  |
| B01–B30            | Baseline of question 1–30                                                 | eqlq 数据集中 EQLQ_001～EQLQ_030 (EORTC 问卷题目)                                                                      | eqlq                                                                                                                                                                                   | EQLQ_001–EQLQ_030                             |
| B31                | Baseline total score                                                      | 无直接字段，需要对 B01–B30 汇总计算                                                                                    | NA                                                                                                                                                                                     | NA                                            |
